Supervised Task

Source: R/TaskSupervised.R
TaskSupervised.Rd

This is the abstract base class for task objects like TaskClassif and TaskRegr. It extends Task with methods to handle a target columns.

Format

R6::R6Class object inheriting from Task.

Construction

t = TaskSupervised$new(id, task_type, backend, target)

  • id :: character(1)
    Identifier for the task.

  • backend :: DataBackend
    Either a DataBackend, or any object which is convertible to a DataBackend with as_data_backend(). E.g., a data.frame() will be converted to a DataBackendDataTable.

  • task_type :: character(1)
    Set in the classes which inherit from this class. Must be an element of mlr_reflections$task_types$type.

  • target :: character(1)
    Name of the target column.

Fields

See Task.

Methods

All methods from Task, and additionally:

  • truth(rows = NULL) :: any
    True response for specified row_ids. Format depends on the task type. Defaults to all rows with role "use".

See also

Other Task: TaskClassif, TaskRegr, Task, mlr_tasks

Examples

task = TaskSupervised$new("iris", task_type = "classif", backend = iris, target = "Species")
